name: The Dark Knight March
description:
(Please use this resolution 720*480 )

You, the Dark Knight, have taken up the challenge to strike through the enormous enemy legions and deepen as much as you can in their lines.

Try to avoid any fight by running through the holes in their ranks.

But if stuck or you hate to be stooped by any one ,march forward with you flaming spear .

marching use your energy , to refill the energy you need to collect coins.

any fight with the enemy soldier will harm you , try to avoid them as much as you can until you have enough energy .

Tell everybody in the comments how much score you got !

Controls:

Press Right or Left Arrow to move , Space to march

This game was made in LudumDare 34

Resources:

Sound Effects: www.freesound.org

Music:

"Future Gladiator" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
